parse.name: Parse
parse.description: Convert an XML string to an object.

build.name: Build
build.description: Convert an object to an XML string.

exportGroup.name: Export Folder
exportGroup.description: Export a folder as a JSON File.

exportFlo.name: Export Flow
exportFlo.description: Export a flow as a JSON File.

parse.name: Parse
parse.description: Parse full URL text into its encoded parts.

format.name: Format
format.description: Create a URL string from HTTP URL components.

encodeComponent.name: Encode Component
encodeComponent.description: Encode text for use within an URL query. All characters with special URL meaning will be encoded.

encode.name: Encode
encode.description: Encode a query object into a URL-encoded query string.

decodeComponent.name: Decode Component
decodeComponent.description: Decode URL-encoded text to obtain the original text.

decode.name: Decode
decode.description: Decode a URL-encoded query string into a query object.

uuid.name: UUID
uuid.description: Generate a random unique ID (UUID), such as a tracking number for a transaction.

trim.name: Trim
trim.description: Remove leading and trailing blank spaces.

substr.name: Substring
substr.description: Return a portion of text (aka Substring).

split.name: Split
split.description: Split text into a list of segments separated by commas or other specified delimiter.

replaceAny.name: Replace Any
replaceAny.description: Find and replace any of multiple patterns with a single value.

random.name: Random
random.description: Generate random text of a specified length.

match.name: Match
match.description: Search text for the first match of a pattern.

length.name: Length
length.description: Calculate the length of a text input.

lastIndexOf.name: Last Index Of
lastIndexOf.description: Search for the last match inside text. Returns the position (index) or -1 if not found.

find.name: Find
find.description: Search text for the first match. Returns the position, where 0 is the first position and -1 if not found.

email.name: Email
email.description: Find the first instance of a valid email address in a text.

concat.name: Concat
concat.description: Combine a list of text into a single text.

compose.name: Compose
compose.description: Enter free form text and optionally drag fields into your text like a mail merge.

base64Decode.name: Base64 Decode
base64Decode.description: Return the base64 decoding of a text string.

base64.name: Base64
base64.description: Return the base64 encoding of a text string.

at.name: At
at.description: Return the single character at a specified position in a text, where 0 is the first position.

zip.name: Zip
zip.description: Create an object from two lists, by mapping keys from the first lists to values from the second.

values.name: Values
values.description: Create a list of the values from an object.

unset.name: Unset
unset.description: Remove a key/value pair from an object.

split.name: Split
split.description: Split an object into a list of objects, each with 'key' and 'value' properties. This is the inverse of the 'collapse' operation.

size.name: Size
size.description: Calculate the number of key/value pairs in an object.

set.name: Set
set.description: Set a key of an object to a specified value, creating a new key if it doesn't exist already.

process.name: Process
process.description: Convert an object to a new object. Each key/value pair in the input object is sent to a process Flow that generates a key/value pair for the output object.

pick.name: Pick
pick.description: Pick several values from an object at once.

move.name: Move
move.description: Move a value from one key to another in an object; i.e. rename a key while preserving the value.

map.name: Map
map.description: Convert an object to a list. Each key/value pair in the input object is sent to a Flow that generates an item to add to the output list.

keys.name: Keys
keys.description: Create a list of the keys from an object.

get.name: Get
get.description: Read a value from an object at a given path.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Filter empty values from an object. If the object contains other objects, use Clear Empty instead.

each.name: Each
each.description: Process an object by calling a Flow for each key/value pair in the object.

construct.name: Construct
construct.description: Create an object from multiple inputs.

collapse.name: Collapse
collapse.description: Collapse a list of objects with 'key' and 'value' properties into a single object, removing duplicates. This is the inverse of the 'split' operation.

clearEmpty.name: Clear Empty
clearEmpty.description: Clear all empty key/value pairs in an object. An empty string, empty object, empty list, null, and undefined are considered empty values.

toFixed.name: To Fixed
toFixed.description: Round a number to a fixed number of decimal places.

sqrt.name: Square Root
sqrt.description: Calculate the square root of a number.

sign.name: Sign
sign.description: Calculate the sign of a number, returning either -1, 0 or 1.

round.name: Round
round.description: Round a number to the nearest integer.

random.name: Random Integer
random.description: Generate a random integer between two numbers.

power.name: Power
power.description: Calculate a base number raised to a specified power, or exponent.

mod.name: Modulo
mod.description: Calculate the remainder after division of one number by another (Modulo).

floor.name: Floor
floor.description: Round down to the nearest integer (aka Floor).

factorial.name: Factorial
factorial.description: Calculate the factorial of a number, or 0 if the input is less than 0.

expression.name: Expression
expression.description: Create a math expression and optionally drag fields in as inputs.

exp.name: Exponent
exp.description: Calculate Euler's number, e (~2.718), raised to a specified power.

ceil.name: Ceiling
ceil.description: Round up to the nearest integer (aka Ceiling).

add.name: Add
add.description: Add two or more numbers together.

abs.name: Absolute Value
abs.description: Disregard the sign of a number (e.g. absolute values of -2 and 2 are both 2).

zip.name: Zip
zip.description: Takes two lists of equal length, A and B, and combines them into a single list where index i is a list of the form [A[i], B[i]].

xor.name: XOR
xor.description: Given two lists, return a list of items that are not in both lists.

unshift.name: Unshift
unshift.description: Add an item to the start of a list (aka Unshift).

uniqueBy.name: Remove Duplicates
uniqueBy.description: Filter duplicate items from a list.

unique.name: Unique
unique.description: Custom filter duplicate items from a list using a Flow to determine the value of each item in the list.

union.name: Union (Combine Unique)
union.description: Combine multiple lists into a single list of all of the unique values contained in any of the input lists.

truncate.name: Truncate
truncate.description: Cut a list down to a specified length.

swap.name: Swap
swap.description: Swap two elements in a list.

sum.name: Sum
sum.description: Add up a list of numbers.

stats.name: Statistics
stats.description: Read stats about a list of numbers.

split.name: Split
split.description: Split a list at the provided index.

sort.name: Sort
sort.description: Custom sort a list. Each item in the list is sent to a Flow that generates a sort value for that item.

slice.name: Slice
slice.description: Choose a subset of a list using start and end points.

shift.name: Shift
shift.description: Given a list, return two outputs: the first item and the list with that item removed (aka Shift).

sample.name: Sample
sample.description: Generate a random sample from a list.

reverse.name: Reverse
reverse.description: Reverse the order of items in a list.

reduce.name: Reduce
reduce.description: Convert a list to a single object or value by running a Flow on each item in the list.

push.name: Push
push.description: Add an item to the end of a list (aka Push).

pop.name: Pop
pop.description: Given a list, return two outputs: the last item and the list with that item removed (aka Pop).

pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.description: Given a list of objects, create a new list using only a specified portion from each object.

merge.name: Merge
merge.description: Merge objects from multiple lists at matching offsets.

map.name: Map
map.description: Convert a list to a new list of the same size. Each item in the input list is sent to a Flow that generates the value to use for the same position in the output list.

length.name: Length
length.description: Count the number of items in a list.

join.name: Join
join.description: Join the values of a list into a single text output separated by an optional delimiter, such as a comma.

intersection.name: Intersection
intersection.description: Create a list of items that are included in all of the input lists.

indexBy.name: Index By
indexBy.description: Index a list of objects by the value at a specified path.

includes.name: Includes
includes.description: Check if a list includes a value.

groupBy.name: Group By
groupBy.description: Group a list by values specified at the 'path' input, producing an object where the keys are the unique values at the 'path' from each element.

flatten.name: Flatten
flatten.description: Turn a list that contains lists into a single list.

findBy.name: Find By
findBy.description: Find the first item in a list that meets a specified condition.

find.name: Find
find.description: Find the first item in a list that passes a custom test. Each item in the input list is sent to a Flow that returns True for a match.

filterBy.name: Filter By
filterBy.description: Filter a list to include only those items that meet a specified condition.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Filter a list using a custom test. Each item in the input list is sent to a Flow that returns True for any item to include in the result list.

each.name: Each
each.description: Process items in a list by calling a Flow for each item.

difference.name: Difference
difference.description: Create a list of items from one list that do not appear in a second list.

construct.name: Construct
construct.description: Create a list from multiple inputs.

collapse.name: Collapse
collapse.description: Merge a list of objects into a single object. If more than one object in the list has the same key, the later value is used.

at.name: At
at.description: Return the item at a specific position in a list, where the first item is in position 0.

asyncEach.name: Async Each
asyncEach.description: Process items in a list by calling a Flow for each item, continuing through all items in the list even if one of them causes an error in the helper Flow (aka For Each Async).

verify.name: Verify
verify.description: Decode and verify a JSON Web Token.

sign.name: Sign
sign.description: Encode and sign a JSON Web Token.

decode.name: Decode
decode.description: Decode a JSON Web Token without verifying the signature.

stringify.name: Stringify
stringify.description: Convert a JSON object to a string (text).

parse.name: Parse
parse.description: Parse a JSON string into an object or list.

unix.name: UNIX
unix.description: Generate the UNIX standard format for a date & time.

subtract.name: Subtract
subtract.description: Subtract a multiple of a unit of time (e.g. seconds) from a starting date & time.

parse.name: String To Date
parse.description: Parse text into a date & time according to a specified format (e.g. MM/DD/YYYY).

iso.name: ISO
iso.description: Generate the ISO 8601 format for a date & time.

fromISO.name: From ISO String
fromISO.description: Convert a date & time to a variety of formats.

format.name: Date To String
format.description: Format a date & time using a specified format (e.g. MM/DD/YYYY) and timezone.

epoch.name: Epoch
epoch.description: Generate the UNIX Epoch format for a date & time.

diff.name: Difference
diff.description: Calculate the difference between two dates & times.

add.name: Add
add.description: Add a multiple of some unit of time (e.g. seconds) to a starting date & time.

sign.name: Sign
sign.description: Signs input text with an input algorithm and private key, and digests the return string on output with hex, binary, or base64 encoding. Accepts any hashing algorithm specified by OpenSSL. Defaults digest encoding to 'hex' if unspecified.

hmac.name: HMAC
hmac.description: HMAC-encrypt text using a HMAC algorithm specified by OpenSSL.

hash.name: Hash
hash.description: Hash-encrypt text and digest the return string on output with hex, binary, or base64 encoding, using a specified OpenSSL hashing algorithm.

decipher.name: Decipher
decipher.description: Decrypt a base64 encoding using a specified cipher-based OpenSSL algorithm.

cipher.name: Cipher
cipher.description: Encrypt text and return a base64 encoding using a specified cipher-based OpenSSL algorithm.

aes.name: AES
aes.description: AES-encrypt text. Accepts any AES-based algorithm specified by OpenSSL.

wait.name: Wait For
wait.description: Pause the Flow and wait for the specified period of time before continuing.

until.name: Wait Until
until.description: Pause the Flow and wait until the specified time to continue.

tryCatch.name: If Error
tryCatch.description: Try a series of actions. If there's an error, run a different series of actions.

times.name: Times
times.description: Repeatedly run a Flow a specified number of times.

throwIf.name: Throw If
throwIf.description: If a condition is true, throw an error and end the Flow.

throw.name: Throw
throw.description: Throw an error and end the Flow.

spawn.name: Call FLO
spawn.description: Run a Flow and wait for the resulting output.

run.name: Call FLO Async
run.description: Start another Flow then continue without waiting for that Flow to finish.

returnRaw.name: Return Raw
returnRaw.description: Return raw http data from a Flow to the caller, such as XML.

return.name: Return
return.description: End the Flow and return values to the caller of the Flow.

pauseRaw.name: Pause Raw
pauseRaw.description: Pause the Flow and return raw http data (such as XML) to the caller. Resume it by calling the Resume API.

pause.name: Pause
pause.description: Pause the Flow and return data to the caller. Resume it by calling the Resume API.

lookup.name: Lookup
lookup.description: Convert one value to another using a lookup table

let.name: Assign
let.description: Create new output fields based on the input supplied.

if.name: If/Else
if.description: Specify different actions to run based on whether or not a single condition is true.

continueIf.name: Continue If
continueIf.description: Stop the Flow if a condition isn't true.

branch.name: Branch
branch.description: Specify different actions to run based on multiple if and else conditions (similar to switch or case in some programming languages)

assignIf.name: Assign If
assignIf.description: Choose a value based on a true/false condition.

xor.name: XOR
xor.description: Return true if one, and only one, input is true (XOR).

xnor.name: XNOR
xnor.description: Return true if both outputs are true or if both outputs are false.

or.name: OR
or.description: Return true if any input is true.

not.name: Not
not.description: Return true if false; false if true.

nor.name: NOR
nor.description: Return true if all inputs are false (NOR).

nand.name: NAND
nand.description: Return true if any input is false (NAND).

expression.name: Expression
expression.description: Run a complex true/false test using fields, operators, and values.

compare.name: Compare
compare.description: Run a simple true/false test (e.g. Price > 100).

and.name: AND
and.description: Return true if all inputs are true.
